pr_title: [homekit] add support for window covering without inversion

timeline.message:
add support window covering without inversion

Signed-off-by: Eugen Freiter <freiter@gmx.de>

fix typo in README and apply spotless

Signed-off-by: Eugen Freiter <freiter@gmx.de>

timeline.bodyText: Does this need to be a field?
timeline.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText: good point. i used it in the first version in some "IF"s but then i found a solution without "IF". so, dont need anymore. removing
replies.author: yfre
